## Generator\_2.workspaceToCode() method

Generate code for all blocks in the workspace to the specified language.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
workspaceToCode(workspace?: Workspace): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  workspace | [Workspace](./blockly.workspace.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Workspace to generate code from.  Generated code. |

string
